
            <h1 class="postTitle">
                <a id="cb_post_title_url" class="postTitle2 vertical-middle" href="https://www.cnblogs.com/Can-daydayup/p/18968764" title="发布于 2025-07-06 14:51">
    <span role="heading" aria-level="2">C#/.NET/.NET Core优秀项目和框架2025年6月简报</span>
    

</a>

            </h1>
            <div class="clear"></div>
            <div class="postBody">
                <div id="cnblogs_post_body" class="blogpost-body blogpost-body-html">
<p><img src="https://img2024.cnblogs.com/blog/1336199/202507/1336199-20250706144117584-954232870.png" alt="" loading="lazy"></p>
<h2 data-tool="mdnice编辑器"><span>前言</span></h2>
<p data-tool="mdnice编辑器"><span>公众号每月定期推广和分享的C#/.NET/.NET Core优秀项目和框架（每周至少会推荐两个优秀的项目和框架当然节假日除外），公众号推文中有项目和框架的详细介绍、功能特点、使用方式以及部分功能截图等（打不开或者打开GitHub很慢的同学可以优先查看公众号推文，文末一定会附带项目和框架源码地址）。注意：排名不分先后，都是十分优秀的开源项目和框架，每周定期更新分享（欢迎关注公众号：<strong>追逐时光者</strong><span>，第一时间获取每周精选分享资讯🔔）。</span></span></p>
<ul class="list-paddingleft-1">
<li><strong>💡简报Gitee开源地址：<span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)"><a href="https://gitee.com/ysgdaydayup/DotNetGuide/blob/main/docs/DotNet/DotNetProjectMonthly.md" target="_blank" rel="noopener nofollow"><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">https://gitee.com/ysgdaydayup/DotNetGuide/blob/main/docs/DotNet/DotNetProjectMonthly.md</span></a></span></strong></li>
<li><strong>🔔简报GitHub开源地址：<span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)"><a href="https://github.com/YSGStudyHards/DotNetGuide/blob/main/docs/DotNet/DotNetProjectMonthly.md" target="_blank" rel="noopener nofollow"><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">https://github.com/YSGStudyHards/DotNetGuide/blob/main/docs/DotNet/DotNetProjectMonthly.md</span></a></span></strong></li>
<li><strong>👪DotNetGuide技术社区：<span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)"><a class="normal_text_link" href="https://mp.weixin.qq.com/s?__biz=MzIxMTUzNzM5Ng==&amp;mid=2247508804&amp;idx=2&amp;sn=5bffb84644b6475a5afaf5e655f3817d&amp;scene=21#wechat_redirect" target="_blank" data-linktype="2" rel="noopener nofollow"><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">https://mp.weixin.qq.com/s/6H2-x-Von_s-04-c2CtSHg</span></a></span></strong></li>
</ul>
<h2 data-tool="mdnice编辑器"><span>DistributedLock</span></h2>
<ul class="list-paddingleft-1">
<li><strong>项目简介：</strong><span>&nbsp;DistributedLock 是一个 .NET 开源的库，它基于多种底层技术提供了强大且易于使用的分布式互斥锁、读写锁和信号量。确保多个线程、进程或服务能够安全、协调地访问共享资源，防止竞态条件，维护数据一致性。</span></li>
<li><strong>项目源码地址：</strong>&nbsp;<span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)"><a href="https://github.com/madelson/DistributedLock" target="_blank" rel="noopener nofollow"><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">https://github.com/madelson/DistributedLock</span></a></span></li>
<li><strong>项目详细介绍：</strong><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)"><a class="normal_text_link" href="https://mp.weixin.qq.com/s?__biz=MzIxMTUzNzM5Ng==&amp;mid=2247514879&amp;idx=1&amp;sn=cc6b2fe4656faa5a2f9881064eb0f1ea&amp;scene=21#wechat_redirect" target="_blank" data-linktype="2" rel="noopener nofollow"><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">https://mp.weixin.qq.com/s/3P3rkVE4j39knCtpRVtzDg</span></a></span></li>
</ul>
<p><img src="https://img2024.cnblogs.com/blog/1336199/202507/1336199-20250706144240331-1368116794.png" alt="" loading="lazy"></p>
<h2 data-tool="mdnice编辑器"><span>xUnit</span></h2>
<ul class="list-paddingleft-1">
<li><strong>项目简介：</strong><span>&nbsp;xUnit 是一个开源、免费、以社区为中心的 .NET 单元测试框架，是用于 C# 和 F#（其他 .NET 语言可能也能运行，但未提供官方支持）进行单元测试的最新技术。xUnit 能够与 Visual Studio、Visual Studio Code、<span>ReSharper、CodeRush 和 TestDriven.NET 兼容。它是.NET 基金会的一部分，并遵循其行为准则。</span></span></li>
<li><strong>项目源码地址：</strong>&nbsp;<span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)"><a href="https://github.com/xunit/xunit" target="_blank" rel="noopener nofollow"><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">https://github.com/xunit/xunit</span></a></span></li>
<li><strong>项目详细介绍：</strong><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)"><a class="normal_text_link" href="https://mp.weixin.qq.com/s?__biz=MzIxMTUzNzM5Ng==&amp;mid=2247514754&amp;idx=1&amp;sn=c9a6ee07e6f1d36c2b28b977886cbabe&amp;scene=21#wechat_redirect" target="_blank" data-linktype="2" rel="noopener nofollow"><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">https://mp.weixin.qq.com/s/_jZNx2V1mRJCVL4m0nFzxw</span></a></span></li>
</ul>
<h2 data-tool="mdnice编辑器"><span>FluentCMS</span></h2>
<ul class="list-paddingleft-1">
<li><strong>项目简介：</strong><span>&nbsp;FluentCMS 是一个开源（<span>MIT license）、现代化的内容管理系统（CMS），它基于强大的 ASP.NET Core + Blazor技术构建。FluentCMS助力内容写作者更高效地创作内容。其设计快速、灵活且用户友好，不仅具备传统基于内容的CMS功能，还擅长作为无头CMS（headless CMS），使其非常适合各种数字应用场景。</span></span></li>
<li><strong>项目源码地址：</strong>&nbsp;<span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)"><a href="https://github.com/fluentcms/FluentCMS" target="_blank" rel="noopener nofollow"><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">https://github.com/fluentcms/FluentCMS</span></a></span></li>
<li><strong>项目详细介绍：</strong><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)"><a class="normal_text_link" href="https://mp.weixin.qq.com/s?__biz=MzIxMTUzNzM5Ng==&amp;mid=2247514252&amp;idx=1&amp;sn=7329476729b74e646ddf25474b58c286&amp;scene=21#wechat_redirect" target="_blank" data-linktype="2" rel="noopener nofollow"><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">https://mp.weixin.qq.com/s/nUa36FU5PUirtYx_k3d-bw</span></a></span></li>
</ul>
<p><img src="https://img2024.cnblogs.com/blog/1336199/202507/1336199-20250706144321429-1988959351.png" alt="" loading="lazy"></p>
<h2 data-tool="mdnice编辑器"><span>EF Core Power Tools</span></h2>
<ul class="list-paddingleft-1">
<li><strong>项目简介：</strong><span>&nbsp;EF Core Power Tools 是一款基于 C# 编写、开源免费（MIT license）、在 EF Core 命令行工具的基础上构建的适用于 Visual Studio 2022 中的 EF Core 反向工程和模型可视化扩展插件。它提供了反向工程、迁移和模型可视化、生成关系图、生成SQL语句等功能，旨在降低使用 EF Core 的门槛，并通过图形用户界面（GUI）辅助开发者进行数据库的反向工程和<span>DbContext模型的可视化。</span></span></li>
<li><strong>项目源码地址：</strong>&nbsp;<span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)"><a href="https://github.com/ErikEJ/EFCorePowerTools" target="_blank" rel="noopener nofollow"><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">https://github.com/ErikEJ/EFCorePowerTools</span></a></span></li>
<li><strong>项目详细介绍：</strong><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)"><a class="normal_text_link" href="https://mp.weixin.qq.com/s?__biz=MzIxMTUzNzM5Ng==&amp;mid=2247514422&amp;idx=1&amp;sn=32135c7a1bb6279c52e32d6d0c3933dc&amp;scene=21#wechat_redirect" target="_blank" data-linktype="2" rel="noopener nofollow"><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">https://mp.weixin.qq.com/s/nnJndy3C1VwZz5Yu1yPd_A</span></a></span></li>
</ul>
<p><img src="https://img2024.cnblogs.com/blog/1336199/202507/1336199-20250706144403216-751477928.png" alt="" loading="lazy"></p>
<p><img src="https://img2024.cnblogs.com/blog/1336199/202507/1336199-20250706144408361-46659114.png" alt="" loading="lazy"></p>
<h2 data-tool="mdnice编辑器"><span>Platform</span></h2>
<ul class="list-paddingleft-1">
<li><strong>项目简介：</strong><span>&nbsp;Platform 是一套基于 .NET + Ant Design Vue 开源（MIT License）、免费的低代码、权限、工作流、动态接口平台。</span></li>
<li><strong>项目源码地址：</strong>&nbsp;<span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)"><a href="https://gitee.com/Jesai/platform" target="_blank" rel="noopener nofollow"><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">https://gitee.com/Jesai/platform</span></a></span></li>
<li><strong>项目详细介绍：</strong><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)"><a class="normal_text_link" href="https://mp.weixin.qq.com/s?__biz=MzIxMTUzNzM5Ng==&amp;mid=2247514706&amp;idx=1&amp;sn=45816ccbf6a3f734886269956059d759&amp;scene=21#wechat_redirect" target="_blank" data-linktype="2" rel="noopener nofollow"><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">https://mp.weixin.qq.com/s/Tg_iC3dNBM8mtxJRT_-CWQ</span></a></span></li>
</ul>
<p><img src="https://img2024.cnblogs.com/blog/1336199/202507/1336199-20250706144439211-1106902547.png" alt="" loading="lazy"></p>
<p><img src="https://img2024.cnblogs.com/blog/1336199/202507/1336199-20250706144446961-665744582.png" alt="" loading="lazy"></p>
<p><img src="https://img2024.cnblogs.com/blog/1336199/202507/1336199-20250706144454540-995662609.png" alt="" loading="lazy"></p>
<h2 data-tool="mdnice编辑器"><span>Masuit.MyBlogs</span></h2>
<ul class="list-paddingleft-1">
<li><strong>项目简介：</strong><span>&nbsp;Masuit.MyBlogs 是一个基于 .NET 8 开源免费（MIT license）、高性能、高安全性、低占用的博客系统，该项目仅 3MB 的代码量，目前日均处理请求数 80-600 W次，同时在线活跃用户数60-600人，数据量累计已达到数百万条，数据库+Redis+网站主程序同时运行在一台4核8GB的机器上，浏览器页面请求秒级响应，CPU平均使用率控制在10%左右，内存占用控制在400MB左右。</span></li>
<li><strong>项目源码地址：</strong>&nbsp;<span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)"><a href="https://github.com/ldqk/Masuit.MyBlogs" target="_blank" rel="noopener nofollow"><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">https://github.com/ldqk/Masuit.MyBlogs</span></a></span></li>
<li><strong>项目详细介绍：</strong><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)"><a class="normal_text_link" href="https://mp.weixin.qq.com/s?__biz=MzIxMTUzNzM5Ng==&amp;mid=2247514653&amp;idx=1&amp;sn=240334882938f98d07fead11dce4d5f5&amp;scene=21#wechat_redirect" target="_blank" data-linktype="2" rel="noopener nofollow"><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">https://mp.weixin.qq.com/s/u1w8DSE_jhnTxzOlBAMfIQ</span></a></span></li>
</ul>
<p><img src="https://img2024.cnblogs.com/blog/1336199/202507/1336199-20250706144533038-606082355.png" alt="" loading="lazy"></p>
<h2 data-tool="mdnice编辑器"><span>P2P</span></h2>
<ul class="list-paddingleft-1">
<li><strong>项目简介：</strong><span>&nbsp;P2P是一个基于 .NET 开源（MIT license）、便捷、高效的远程桌面控制工具，它采用 UDT 协议，并得益于rendezvous 连接技术，能够绕过大多数防火墙规则，就像一个零成本的小型TeamViewer概念！</span></li>
<li><strong>项目源码地址：</strong>&nbsp;<span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)"><a href="https://github.com/miroslavpejic85/p2p" target="_blank" rel="noopener nofollow"><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">https://github.com/miroslavpejic85/p2p</span></a></span></li>
<li><strong>项目详细介绍：</strong><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)"><a class="normal_text_link" href="https://mp.weixin.qq.com/s?__biz=MzIxMTUzNzM5Ng==&amp;mid=2247514634&amp;idx=1&amp;sn=3a609a4d711cbea6785e7dd4a6306a91&amp;scene=21#wechat_redirect" target="_blank" data-linktype="2" rel="noopener nofollow"><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">https://mp.weixin.qq.com/s/fR7yUDiEN-Wa_hInRduudQ</span></a></span></li>
</ul>
<p><img src="https://img2024.cnblogs.com/blog/1336199/202507/1336199-20250706144604097-1799621642.png" alt="" loading="lazy"></p>
<h2 data-tool="mdnice编辑器"><span>SharpSCADA</span></h2>
<ul class="list-paddingleft-1">
<li><strong>项目简介：</strong><span>&nbsp;SharpSCADA是一个基于 C# 编写、开源（LGPL-3.0 license）的轻量级工控网关和 SCADA 组态软件，旨在提供灵活且强大的解决方案，以满足工业自动化和监控的需求。该项目支持多种工业协议，包括西门子的Profinet、AB的EtherNetIPs、施耐德的Modbus和OPC等，采用类OPC接口网关实现数据通信。</span></li>
<li><strong>项目源码地址：</strong>&nbsp;<span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)"><a href="https://github.com/GavinYellow/SharpSCADA" target="_blank" rel="noopener nofollow"><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">https://github.com/GavinYellow/SharpSCADA</span></a></span></li>
<li><strong>项目详细介绍：</strong><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)"><a class="normal_text_link" href="https://mp.weixin.qq.com/s?__biz=MzIxMTUzNzM5Ng==&amp;mid=2247514621&amp;idx=1&amp;sn=7eb5d0442425e493dccfe348415cc051&amp;scene=21#wechat_redirect" target="_blank" data-linktype="2" rel="noopener nofollow"><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">https://mp.weixin.qq.com/s/mDi0NbDrCM4SjyZjNlR9zw</span></a></span></li>
</ul>
<p><img src="https://img2024.cnblogs.com/blog/1336199/202507/1336199-20250706144636904-259161485.png" alt="" loading="lazy"></p>
<p><img src="https://img2024.cnblogs.com/blog/1336199/202507/1336199-20250706144642409-1739592731.png" alt="" width="582" height="337" loading="lazy"></p>
<h2 data-tool="mdnice编辑器"><span>SwarmUI</span></h2>
<ul class="list-paddingleft-1">
<li><strong>项目简介：</strong><span>&nbsp;SwarmUI （原 StableSwarmUI）是一个基于 .NET 开源（MIT license）、模块化 AI 图像生成 Web 用户界面，注重让强大工具易于访问、高性能及可扩展性。支持 AI 图像模型（如Stable Diffusion、Flux等），以及AI视频模型（如LTX-V、Hunyuan Video、Cosmos、Wan等）。</span></li>
<li><strong>项目源码地址：</strong>&nbsp;<span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)"><a href="https://github.com/mcmonkeyprojects/SwarmUI" target="_blank" rel="noopener nofollow"><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">https://github.com/mcmonkeyprojects/SwarmUI</span></a></span></li>
<li><strong>项目详细介绍：</strong><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)"><a class="normal_text_link" href="https://mp.weixin.qq.com/s?__biz=MzIxMTUzNzM5Ng==&amp;mid=2247514302&amp;idx=1&amp;sn=14f051ea2cda1415eba890741571f32f&amp;scene=21#wechat_redirect" target="_blank" data-linktype="2" rel="noopener nofollow"><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">https://mp.weixin.qq.com/s/NCOciHGS5yU7xui3tmT6YA</span></a></span></li>
</ul>
<p><img src="https://img2024.cnblogs.com/blog/1336199/202507/1336199-20250706144730956-2091269619.png" alt="" loading="lazy"></p>
<h2 data-tool="mdnice编辑器"><span>Caviar</span></h2>
<ul class="list-paddingleft-1">
<li><strong>项目简介：</strong><span>&nbsp;Caviar 是一个基于 .NET 8 + Ant Design Blazor 开发的、基于 Apache-2.0 协议开源的后台管理框架，使用简洁架构，简单大方现代，包含了后台管理基础功能，在开发上为了方便，封装了很多Ant Design组件，包含了自动列表、高级搜索、自动化菜单、布局等。此外，该框架在代码生成上实现了100%的代码隔离，确保修改和重新生成代码不会对开发者造成任何影响，同时保持了开发的灵活性。</span></li>
<li><strong>项目源码地址：</strong>&nbsp;<span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)"><a href="https://gitee.com/Cherryblossoms/caviar" target="_blank" rel="noopener nofollow"><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">https://gitee.com/Cherryblossoms/caviar</span></a></span></li>
<li><strong>项目详细介绍：</strong><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)"><a class="normal_text_link" href="https://mp.weixin.qq.com/s?__biz=MzIxMTUzNzM5Ng==&amp;mid=2247514341&amp;idx=1&amp;sn=1f9af6f5c00ba822a4e46735df706273&amp;scene=21#wechat_redirect" target="_blank" data-linktype="2" rel="noopener nofollow"><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">https://mp.weixin.qq.com/s/qhyhfN4u7RBfzHUdQFSpoQ</span></a></span></li>
</ul>
<p><img src="https://img2024.cnblogs.com/blog/1336199/202507/1336199-20250706144813069-1449820742.png" alt="" loading="lazy"></p>
<h2 data-tool="mdnice编辑器"><span>WPF-ControlBase</span></h2>
<ul class="list-paddingleft-1">
<li><strong>项目简介：</strong><span>&nbsp;WPF-ControlBase 是一个开源免费（MIT license）、功能丰富的 WPF 自定义控件资源库。</span></li>
<li><strong>项目源码地址：</strong>&nbsp;<span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)"><a href="https://github.com/HeBianGu/WPF-ControlBase" target="_blank" rel="noopener nofollow"><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">https://github.com/HeBianGu/WPF-ControlBase</span></a></span></li>
<li><strong>项目详细介绍：</strong><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)"><a class="normal_text_link" href="https://mp.weixin.qq.com/s?__biz=MzIxMTUzNzM5Ng==&amp;mid=2247514270&amp;idx=1&amp;sn=3f79af0b5f1837dee29a35b06552d1b8&amp;scene=21#wechat_redirect" target="_blank" data-linktype="2" rel="noopener nofollow"><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">https://mp.weixin.qq.com/s/-KqyJ0X7xxtKFuEt8pUmlQ</span></a></span></li>
</ul>
<p><img src="https://img2024.cnblogs.com/blog/1336199/202507/1336199-20250706144853622-1624026410.png" alt="" loading="lazy"></p>
<p><img src="https://img2024.cnblogs.com/blog/1336199/202507/1336199-20250706144901634-730310273.png" alt="" loading="lazy"></p>
<h2 data-tool="mdnice编辑器"><span>AutoUpdater.NET</span></h2>
<ul class="list-paddingleft-1">
<li><strong>项目简介：</strong><span>&nbsp;AutoUpdater.NET 是一个 .NET 开源类库，允许.NET 开发者轻松为其传统桌面应用程序项目添加自动更新功能（该库仅适用于 WinForms 或 WPF 应用程序项目）。</span></li>
<li><strong>项目源码地址：</strong>&nbsp;<span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)"><a href="https://github.com/ravibpatel/AutoUpdater.NET" target="_blank" rel="noopener nofollow"><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">https://github.com/ravibpatel/AutoUpdater.NET</span></a></span></li>
<li><strong>项目详细介绍：</strong><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)"><a class="normal_text_link" href="https://mp.weixin.qq.com/s?__biz=MzIxMTUzNzM5Ng==&amp;mid=2247514286&amp;idx=1&amp;sn=ead2d088c97524d10d986c8f2a147719&amp;scene=21#wechat_redirect" target="_blank" data-linktype="2" rel="noopener nofollow"><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">https://mp.weixin.qq.com/s/2M-2I2qddvCitkrla4WmLA</span></a></span></li>
</ul>
<p><img src="https://img2024.cnblogs.com/blog/1336199/202507/1336199-20250706144936107-758526130.png" alt="" loading="lazy"></p>
<h2 data-tool="mdnice编辑器"><span>Squirrel.Windows</span></h2>
<ul class="list-paddingleft-1">
<li><strong>项目简介：</strong><span>&nbsp;Squirrel.Windows 是一个开源项目，旨在提供一套工具和库来全面管理 Windows 桌面应用程序的安装和更新。该项目适用于使用 C# 或其他语言（如C++）编写的应用程序。Squirrel 利用 NuGet包来创建安装和更新包，使得开发者能够轻松地创建安装程序并发布更新。</span></li>
<li><strong>项目源码地址：</strong>&nbsp;<span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)"><a href="https://github.com/Squirrel/Squirrel.Windows" target="_blank" rel="noopener nofollow"><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">https://github.com/Squirrel/Squirrel.Windows</span></a></span></li>
<li><strong>项目详细介绍：</strong><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)"><a class="normal_text_link" href="https://mp.weixin.qq.com/s?__biz=MzIxMTUzNzM5Ng==&amp;mid=2247514286&amp;idx=1&amp;sn=ead2d088c97524d10d986c8f2a147719&amp;scene=21#wechat_redirect" target="_blank" data-linktype="2" rel="noopener nofollow"><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">https://mp.weixin.qq.com/s/2M-2I2qddvCitkrla4WmLA</span></a></span></li>
</ul>
<p><img src="https://img2024.cnblogs.com/blog/1336199/202507/1336199-20250706145006101-1959109947.png" alt="" loading="lazy"></p>
<p>&nbsp;</p>
</div>
<div id="MySignature" role="contentinfo">
    <blockquote>
<p style="font-family:YouYuan;font-size: 16px;margin: 0 auto 0.01em auto;"><span style="font-size: 17px; ">作者名称：</span><a href="https://www.cnblogs.com/Can-daydayup/" target="_blank">追逐时光者</a></p>
<p style="font-family:YouYuan;font-size: 16px;margin: 0 auto 0.01em auto;"><span style="font-size: 17px; ">作者简介：</span>一个热爱编程、善于分享、喜欢学习、探索、尝试新事物和新技术的全栈软件工程师。</p>
